page.title: 18POPULATION
page.content: {As in any transition area}between an inner city and the suburbs,a region of very mixed population will occur.This area is no exception.Around the {University}there is a region of {transient population}as would be expected.In a questionnaire asking students for how many weeks a year they lived in Birmingham over{75%}of those asked said they lived in the area for between 30-35 weeks a year, just under 2% for between 36-40 weeks and for the whole year only 8%.However this type of population in the Selly Oak area contrasts with the areas of {Bournbrook and Moseley}where population is more stable and predominately middle class.This region also has a very high proportion of immigrants who originally came from the{Indian sub-continent}and the{West {Indies.
